prompt:
Parse the following job description and extract structured information in JSON format.
    Extract these fields (leave empty if not found):
    - job_id: Job ID or reference number
    - role: The job title or role
    - minimum_experience: Minimum years of experience required (number only)
    - maximum_experience: Maximum years of experience mentioned (number only)
    - industry: The industry this job is in (e.g., IT, Healthcare)
    - notice_period: Required notice period
    - preferred_notice_period: Preferred notice period if mentioned
    - city: City location
    - state: State/province
    - country: Country
    - remote_option: Remote work options (e.g., Remote, Hybrid, Onsite)
    - required_skills: Array of required skills/technologies
    - preferred_skills: Array of preferred/nice-to-have skills
    - qualifications: Array of educational or certification requirements

    If certain information like industry is not explicitly mentioned but can be inferred from the role description (e.g., Web Developer implies IT industry), make a reasonable inference.

    Job Description:
    """Job ID: WD-2023-45

Web Developer - Full Stack
VCET Technologies

We are seeking a talented and passionate Full Stack Web Developer to join our growing team at VCET Technologies. As a web developer, you'll work on cutting-edge web applications and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional digital experiences.

Job Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain responsive and user-friendly web applications
- Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code using modern web technologies
- Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement visual elements and improve user experience
- Develop RESTful APIs and integrate third-party services
- Perform code reviews and ensure code quality standards are maintained
- Troubleshoot and debug applications to optimize performance
- Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends
- Participate in agile development processes including sprint planning and retrospectives

Required Skills:
- HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+)
- React.js or Angular framework experience
- Node.js and Express.js
- RESTful API design and implementation
- Git version control
- MongoDB or SQL database experience
- Responsive web design principles
- Problem-solving and debugging skills

Preferred Skills:
- TypeScript
- Next.js or similar SSR frameworks
- GraphQL
- AWS/Azure/GCP cloud services
- Docker and containerization
- CI/CD pipelines
- Unit and integration testing (Jest, Mocha)
- Performance optimization techniques

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
- At least 3-5 years of professional experience in web development
- Strong portfolio demonstrating previous work
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills

Location:
- Bangalore, Karnataka, India
- Remote option: Hybrid (3 days in office, 2 days remote)

Notice Period:
- Required: 30 days
- Preferred: Immediate to 2 weeks

Experience Required:
- Minimum: 3 years
- Maximum: 7 years
- Preferred Industry: IT, Software Services, or E-commerce

We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and opportunities for professional growth. Join our innovative team and help build the next generation of web applications!"""
    
    Return only valid JSON output, without any additional text or explanations.
response:
{
  "job_id": "WD-2023-45",
  "role": "Web Developer - Full Stack",
  "minimum_experience": 3,
  "maximum_experience": 7,
  "industry": "IT",
  "notice_period": "30 days",
  "preferred_notice_period": "Immediate to 2 weeks",
  "city": "Bangalore",
